mapper.insert:
insert into dm_condition(user_nameaccess_addressip_countrytime_zonetime_continentis_chineseis_mobileis_specific_deviceis_fbclidcreate_timeupdate_timeis_ip) values
(#{entity.userName}#{entity.accessAddress}#{entity.ipCountry}#{entity.timeZone}#{entity.timeContinent}#{entity.isChinese}#{entity.isMobile}#{entity.isSpecificDevice}#{entity.isFbclid}#{entity.createTime}#{entity.updateTime}#{entity.isIp})
on duplicate key update user_name = values(user_name)access_address = values(access_address)ip_country = values(ip_country)time_zone = values(time_zone)time_continent = values(time_continent)is_chinese = values(is_chinese)is_mobile = values(is_mobile)is_specific_device = values(is_specific_device)is_fbclid = values(is_fbclid)create_time = values(create_time)update_time = values(update_time)is_ip = values(is_ip)
